mapper.select: SELECT M.USER_NO userNo , M.USER_ID memberId , M.USER_NAME memberName , M.BIRTHDAY birthDay , M.EMAIL email , M.PHONE phone , M.USER_ROLL role , M.LICENSE_IMG licenseUrl , M.STATUS status , M.ENROLL_DATE enrollDate , L.PASSWORD memberPwd FROM TB_MEMBER M LEFT JOIN TB_LOCAL L ON M.USER_NO = L.USER_NO WHERE M.USER_ID = #{memberId} AND M.STATUS = 'Y'
